name: LimitedAmmo
description: Make people care where they shoot. Limited ammo removes guns upon running out of certain types of ammo.
author: Bluester16

UpdateDelay.description: How fast the plugin checks for ammo. Faster updates generate more logs. Slower updates makes the plugin less consistant.

Authorized.description: List of authorized players that can make ammo boxes and dispencers.

AmountLostOnDeath.description: How much of ammo the player loses upon death. Requires death events to work. 0.0 - 1.0

StarterAmmo.description: How much of ammo is given when respawning or joining. Number of values depends on the ammo setup.

TaxInfiniteWeapons.description: To tax players for using weapons with infinite ammo.

BanInfiniteWeapons.description: To delete weapons with infinite ammo.

SaveAmmoOnLeave.description: To save ammo when the player leaves.

args.name: Type
args.description: In numbers. Amount of types depends on wether or not this plugin's ammo types were modified. By default its 0 - 4.

args.name: Player
args.description: Name of the player. Must be online. You have to type the entire player's name.

commands.name: /wipeammo
commands.description: Wipes everyone's ammo. Only can be used by the host.
